channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #RAshwin said that he hadn't seen for a long time what happe
item.description: #RAshwin said that he hadn't seen for a long time what happened in the first #TestMatch between #Pakistan and #Bangladesh in #Rawalpindi. VIA CrickIt

item.title: #MamataBanerjee had claimed that Prime Minister #NarendraMod
item.description: #MamataBanerjee had claimed that Prime Minister #NarendraModi was using #BJP to ignite fire in #Bengal over the rape and murder of a trainee #doctor

item.title: #AngelinaJolie will be recognised alongside #AmyAdams, #Cate
item.description: #AngelinaJolie will be recognised alongside #AmyAdams, #CateBlanchett, Durga Chew-Bose, David Cronenberg among others.
